title: Classic Mediterranean Salad
description: A vibrant and fresh salad featuring the best of Mediterranean flavors with our premium olive oil.

ingredients.item: OVE Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil

steps: In a large salad bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Add Kalamata olives and crumbled feta cheese to the bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together OVE Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Serve immediately as a side dish or add grilled chicken for a complete meal.

seo.title: Classic Mediterranean Salad Recipe with Premium Olive Oil
seo.description: Fresh and vibrant Mediterranean salad featuring premium olive oil, feta cheese, and garden vegetables. Ready in 15 minutes!

title: Mediterranean Herb-Crusted Chicken
description: Juicy chicken breasts coated in aromatic Mediterranean herbs and cooked to perfection with olive oil.

ingredients.item: OVE Mediterranean Herb Infused Olive Oil

steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Pat chicken breasts dry and season with salt and pepper.
In a bowl, combine breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, parsley, garlic, and lemon zest.
Brush chicken breasts with OVE Mediterranean Herb Infused Olive Oil on both sides.
Press the breadcrumb mixture onto the chicken, coating evenly.
Place on prepared baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes until internal temperature reaches 165°F.
Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
description: The classic Italian pasta dish featuring garlic, olive oil, and red pepper flakes in perfect harmony.

ingredients.item: OVE Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil

steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti according to package directions until al dente.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water before draining.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add sliced garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook until garlic is golden, about 2-3 minutes.
Add drained pasta to the skillet with garlic oil.
Toss pasta with the oil, adding pasta water as needed to create a silky sauce.
Remove from heat, add parsley and half the Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately with remaining cheese on top.

title: Balsamic Glazed Salmon
description: Perfectly cooked salmon with a rich and tangy balsamic glaze that caramelizes beautifully.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
In a small saucepan, combine balsamic vinegar, honey, and garlic. Simmer until reduced by half.
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear salmon skin-side up for 3-4 minutes until golden.
Flip salmon and brush with balsamic glaze. Sprinkle with thyme.
Transfer skillet to oven and bake for 6-8 minutes until salmon flakes easily.
Serve immediately with remaining glaze drizzled on top.

title: Mediterranean Roasted Vegetables
description: Colorful seasonal vegetables roasted to perfection with olive oil and Mediterranean herbs.

ingredients.item: OVE Pure Olive Oil Cooking Spray
OVE Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil

steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.
Cut all vegetables into similar-sized pieces for even cooking.
Spray baking sheet with OVE Olive Oil Cooking Spray.
Arrange vegetables on the baking sheet in a single layer.
Season with salt, pepper, rosemary, and thyme.
Roast for 25-30 minutes, stirring once halfway through.
Drizzle with premium olive oil before serving.
Serve hot as a side dish or over quinoa for a complete meal.

title: Classic Caprese Salad
description: The quintessential Italian salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and aged balsamic.

ingredients.item: OVE Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil

steps: Arrange alternating slices of tomato and mozzarella on a serving platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle the premium olive oil evenly over the salad.
Follow with a drizzle of aged balsamic vinegar.
Season with sea salt and freshly cracked black pepper.
Let stand for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Serve at room temperature with crusty bread.
